QuestData.Title: A Stone of Blood
QuestData.Description:
Unfortunately, we may have another problem. That mist seeping out of the ruins has affected the looting pirates. It's driven them quite mad.
Only one of them seems to be unaffected - a captainly fellow with a very fine hat. He wears a large ruby amulet, which I believe protects him from the mist. You'll need it if you are to enter the tomb.
He may not give it up willingly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Broketooth's Ruby Amulet from Captain Broketooth on the ships near Dreyrgrot.
QuestData.CompletionText: We will need the amulet's protection to proceed.
QuestData.RewardText: You have the amulet! Most excellent!$B$BOf course, that probably won't help you with the pirates that are already mad as hatters, but small victories, eh chap?
